name: Source of Funds Declaration
description: Declares the origin of funds for this specific transaction/matter. Required at MEDIUM and HIGH risk.

label.value: Who is providing the funds for this matter?
options: Combination of client and third party

fields.label: Origin of funds
fields.hint: Describe where the funds are coming from — e.g. personal savings, mortgage advance, business account, sale proceeds

fields.label: Bank or institution name
fields.hint: Name of the bank or financial institution from which funds will be sent

fields.label: Account holder name
fields.hint: Name on the account from which funds will be sent

fields.label: Expected amount and timing
fields.hint: e.g. £350,000 expected within 14 days of settlement
